name: proagent-backend
description: Provectus Backend practice plugin for scalable API design (REST, GraphQL, gRPC), database schema engineering, microservices architecture, authentication and authorization, message queues, caching strategies, and performance optimization.
author: Provectus

skills.name: backend-assistant
skills.description: Building Scalable Backend Services - APIs, databases, microservices, auth, queues, caching, REST, GraphQL, gRPC

agents.name: backend-specialist
agents.description: Senior backend engineer specializing in API design, database schema engineering, microservices architecture, security hardening, and performance optimization

commands.name: proagent-backend-hub
commands.description: Backend practice hub - overview of capabilities and available operations

commands.name: proagent-backend-run
commands.description: Execute backend operations: create-api, design-schema, build-service, setup-auth, optimize-queries

commands.name: proagent-backend-review
commands.description: Review APIs, database schemas, service architecture, and security posture

hooks.description: API validation, schema checks, and security scanning before backend operations
